response.overview: "Tera kosam veshalu" an experimental silence movie, like "pushpaka vimaanam"0f 1980's.Story deals with character changings by the artists. Mainly this story is the 2days journey of 6 artists,who came to perform/act in a reality show competition like Big brother/Big boss.Meanwhile,during the show carona pandemic occurs,then show stopped or continued ,you have to watch it in movie.we can get a precaution for the carona,if we watch the movie. Last but not least"web show made as movie"
response.title: Tera Kosam Veshalu
